name: hive-status
description: A customizable extension to post your status to Hive

commands.title: Enable Hive Status in the current workspace
Disable Hive Status in the current workspace

hive-status.app.name.description:
Choose the name you want the application to use.
Choosing "Custom" will make it so it uses the "rpc.id" as application id

hive-status.app.id.description: Application id that will be used when `appName` is "Custom" or when `appName` is invalid

hive-status.app.privacyMode.enable.description: Should we hide the repository, the file name and the workspace name?

hive-status.app.playerSecret.description: The secret key for player status updates.

hive-status.app.whitelistIsBlacklist.description: Switches the whitelist to a blacklist.

hive-status.app.whitelist.description: List of user ids that will be able to use the extension.

hive-status.status.resetElapsedTimePerFi.description: Should we reset the elapsed time after switching file?

hive-status.status.problems.text.description: This text will be shown when there is a problem.

hive-status.status.problems.countedSever.description: List of problem levels to count for `problems_count`.

hive-status.status.idle.enabled.description: Should we enable the idle status?

hive-status.status.idle.check.description: Should we check when you are idling?

hive-status.status.idle.disconnectOnIdle.description: Should going idle disconnect you from the service?

hive-status.status.idle.resetElapsedTime.description: Should going idle reset the elapsed time?

hive-status.status.idle.timeout.description: Time in seconds before the user is considered idle.

hive-status.ignore.workspaces.description: A list of workspace (name / path) to ignore.

hive-status.ignore.repositories.description: A list of repository names to ignore.

hive-status.ignore.organizations.description: A list of git organizations to ignore.

hive-status.ignore.gitHosts.description: A list of git hosts to ignore.

hive-status.status.details.idle.enabled.description: Should details be shown when idling?

hive-status.status.details.text.idle.description: The text to show when idling.

hive-status.status.details.text.viewing.description: The text to show when viewing a file.

hive-status.status.details.text.notInFil.description: The text to show when you are not in a file.

hive-status.status.state.text.idle.description: The text to show when idling.

hive-status.status.state.text.viewing.description: The text to show when viewing a file.

hive-status.status.state.text.notInFile.description: The text to show when you are not in a file.

hive-status.status.state.text.noWorkspac.description: The text to show when no workspace is found.

hive-status.file.size.round.description: The number of decimal places to round the file size to.

hive-status.behaviour.additionalFileMapp.description: Additional regex to check for language, key is regex and value is the language.

hive-status.behaviour.statusBarAlignment.description: Changing the alignment of the status bar.

hive-status.file.size.standard.description: The unit standard to use when displaying the file size.
